mapper.insert: INSERT INTO et_product_inquiry ( product_id, user_id, content, is_private, status ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{isPrivate}, 'OPEN' )
mapper.select: SELECT inquiry_id, product_id, user_id, u.email AS user_email, content, is_private, status, answer_content, answered_by_user_id, answered_at, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM et_product_inquiry i INNER JOIN et_user u ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}

SELECT inquiry_id, product_id, user_id, u.email AS user_email, content, is_private, status, answer_content, answered_by_user_id, answered_at, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM et_product_inquiry i INNER JOIN et_user u ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE i.product_id = #{productId} AND i.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY i.inquiry_id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE et_product_inquiry SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId} AND deleted_at IS NULL

UPDATE et_product_inquiry SET answer_content = #{answerContent}, answered_by_user_id = #{answeredByUserId}, answered_at = NOW(), status = #{status} WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE et_product_inquiry SET answer_content = NULL, answered_by_user_id = NULL, answered_at = NULL, status = #{status} WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
